chapter.text: 93|3|Omo wa, anata o misute rarezu, nikuma reta wakede mo nai.
93|4|Hontōni raise (shōrai) wa, anata ni totte utsushiyo (genzai) yori, motto yoi nodearu.
93|5|Yagate omo wa anata no manzoku suru mono o o sazuke ni naru.
93|6|Kare wa minashigo no anata o mitsuke rare, higo nasa retade wanai ka.
93|7|Kare wa samayotte ita anata o mitsukete, michibiki o atae.
93|8|Mata mazushī anata o mitsukete, yūfuku ni nasa retade wanai ka.
93|10|Kou mono o 揆 Ne tsukete wa naranai.
93|11|Anata no omo no onkei o nobetsutaeru ga ī.
